mapper.insert: insert into member (ucode, uemail, upwd, uname, signtype, accesstoken) values ('h' || member_seq.nextval, #{uemail}, #{upwd}, #{uname}, 'h', #{accesstoken})
mapper.select: select * from member where uemail = #{uemail} and signtype= 'h'
select count(*) from member where uemail = #{uemail} and signtype= 'h'
